mapper.insert: insert into app_student( member_id, pst_no, bas_addr, det_addr, work, gender, level) values(#{no},#{postNo},#{basicAddress},#{detailAddress},#{working},#{gender},#{level})
mapper.select:
select m.member_id, m.name, m.email, m.tel, s.work, s.level from app_student s inner join app_member m on s.member_id = m.member_id
where m.name like(concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) or m.email like(concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) or m.tel like(concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) or s.bas_addr like(concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) or s.det_addr like(concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
order by m.name asc

select m.member_id, m.name, m.email, m.tel, m.created_date, s.pst_no, s.bas_addr, s.det_addr, s.work, s.gender, s.level from app_student s inner join app_member m on s.member_id = m.member_id where m.member_id=#{no}

select m.member_id, m.name, m.email, m.tel, m.created_date, s.pst_no, s.bas_addr, s.det_addr, s.work, s.gender, s.level from app_student s inner join app_member m on s.member_id = m.member_id where m.email = #{email} and m.pwd = sha2(#{password},256)
mapper.update: update app_student set pst_no=#{postNo}, bas_addr=#{basicAddress}, det_addr=#{detailAddress}, work=#{working}, gender=#{gender}, level=#{level} where member_id=#{no}
